text: Kare-ra wa arr훮 no soto ni, kare-ra o gaisezu, mata eki no nai mono ni tsukaete,`korera (no kamigami) wa, arr훮 no gozen de watashi-tachi o torinasu monodesu.' To iu. Itte yaru ga 카. `Anata gata wa, tenchi ni oite arr훮 no shiranai koto o, kare ni tsugeyou to suru no ka.' Kare o tatae nasai. Kare hakare-ra ga haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru
